EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.SmartIPNet.none.N.G.N.14705.Smart IP Nurture campaign.Email 09
EmailTemplate.subject: It’s the first…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> It’s the first… Introducing the world’s first multi-terabit network processor On June 14, 2017, something incredible happened.
Nokia launched the FP4, a new 2.4 Tbps network processers unit for Nokia’s 7750 and 7950 router portfolios. The FP4-enabled 7750 and 7950 routers address the unique needs of two markets – communications service providers and internet content providers.
Up until now vendors have been faced with the challenge of meeting the needs of a split market, but that’s over now. Get the full story, including why BT has provided a resounding endorsement for FP4. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
